about_the_game:
Welcome to "Limit Choice," a new roguelike card game that tests the limits of deck building and strategy.

In this game, a wide variety of unique cards will make their appearance, each wielding diverse skills to support your battles. With every confrontation against enemies and overcoming of difficult trials, your deck evolves, gaining ever-increasing power. Each decision you make paves the way for the strengthening of your deck and ultimately, your victory.

Various dungeons such as caves and valleys will appear. Each dungeon comes with its unique gimmicks and enemies, demanding you to adapt and construct the optimal deck to clear the stage.
